# Read App Info Localization Information

**Web Service Endpoint**

Read localized app-level information.

## Reading App Localization Information

- **List All App Info Localizations for an App Info**: Get a list of localized, app-level information for an app.

items.description: Get a list of localized, app-level information for an app.
